name: CoronaWarrior
description: Hi Guys,This is my First Game and Its a Pretty Interesting Game.So be sure to download it and leave a comment for more games.How to download-First you need to download this file and then search for scratch on a web browser.Download scratch then Open it.Just click on file at the Top Most Right and then click on Load from your computer and then select th downloaded file named CoronaWarrior.sb3 and there you go you can start the game by clicking on The green flag and stop it by clicking the Red button.Guys I will also make a video for Installing the game on my Channel.If you want to check it out then check my channel https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCG5OqDe_-ePXkAoLAeMXMYw here.Guys plz show support towards my Game.I will really appreciate for a download and a comment.Bye Guys
developers: Guitarboy Gamer Bug Fixer and Recreator
